name: Olympic Powerlifting Barbell
description: High-quality 20kg Olympic powerlifting barbell with 28mm diameter and 200k PSI tensile strength.
features: Constructed from high-grade steel with 200k PSI tensile strength
28mm diameter shaft with dual knurl marks for Olympic and powerlifting
Sleeves rotate on high-quality needle bearings for smooth spin
Chrome finish for durability and corrosion resistance
IWF and IPF specification compliant

name: 13MM Lever Belt
description: 13mm thick genuine leather weightlifting belt with a secure lever buckle for maximum support.
features: Constructed from heavyweight 13mm genuine leather for maximum support
Patented lever buckle system for quick tightening and release
Suede lining to prevent slipping during heavy lifts
IPF approved and competition legal
Made in the USA with premium vegetable-tanned leather

name: 10MM Lever Belt
description: 10mm thick genuine leather weightlifting belt with a secure lever buckle for maximum support.
features: Constructed from 10mm thick genuine leather for balance of support and flexibility
Quick-release lever mechanism for easy adjustment between lifts
Double stitching throughout for enhanced durability
IPF approved for competition use
Available in multiple sizes with customizable hole spacing

name: Knee Sleeves (Pair)
description: 7mm thick neoprene knee sleeves for added compression and stability during heavy squats.
features: Constructed from heavyweight 7mm neoprene for optimal compression
Manufactured with Meryl® and Lycra® fibers to stay soft and breathable
Anatomically shaped for perfect fit during lifts
IPF approved and IWF, USAPL and USPA compliant
Made in Sheffield, Great Britain

name: Lifting Chalk Block
description: Premium magnesium carbonate lifting chalk for improved grip and reduced hand moisture.
features: Pure magnesium carbonate for maximum moisture absorption
Easy-break design to minimize waste
Fine grain texture for optimal coverage
Residue-minimizing formula to reduce gym cleanup
56g (2oz) block provides long-lasting use

name: Wrist Wraps (Pair)
description: Heavy-duty wrist wraps providing extra wrist support during pressing movements.
features: Constructed from high-tensile elastic material for maximum support
Reinforced thumb loop for secure positioning
Heavy-duty Velcro closure system ensures proper tightness
Available in multiple lengths for different support needs
IPF approved for competition use

name: Deadlift Slippers
description: Ultra-thin sole deadlift slippers for improved ground contact and stability.
features: 2mm ultra-thin rubber sole for maximum ground feel
Lightweight mesh upper for breathability
Wide toe box allows for natural toe splay during lifts
Non-slip surface pattern for improved traction
Minimal heel-to-toe drop for optimal deadlift position

name: Powerlifting Singlet
description: IPF-approved powerlifting singlet with a comfortable and competition-ready fit.
features: Constructed from heavyweight 350gm double jersey fabric
Manufactured with Meryl® and Lycra® fibers for durability and compression
Four-way stretch material allows full range of motion
IPF approved and IWF, USAPL and USPA compliant
Made in Sheffield, Great Britain

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Set of heavy-duty resistance bands for warm-ups, mobility work, and accommodating resistance.
features: Set includes 5 bands of varying resistance levels (10-175lbs)
Made from layered natural latex for maximum durability
Color-coded for easy identification of resistance level
Seamless tube design prevents weak points and tearing
Includes carrying bag and exercise guide
